txt.en: Malkorlash is in northern Elderslade.\n\nYou should defeat enemies at the hobgoblin camp, Malkorlash.
Malkorlash is crawling with enemies who need to be disposed.
'Well done, friend. Gunvald was right about your prowess. I suspect many will be the songs that sing of your glory when this is all over.'
Borghild is north-east of Malkorlash in eastern Elderslade.\n\nTalk to Borghild.
'My eyes and ears are better than my sword arm, or I should join you in this task.'

'Gunvald's missive sends word that reinforcements are on the way. I must move on to my next scouting location, but if you are as resourceful as Gunvald says, you could be of great help.

'At the camp up the road there is a swarming nest of hobgoblins. Yes, that seems to be the source of that wretched stench.

'The hobgoblins are squatting in a gap between this mountain's two peaks. From there, they control the nearby river and the pass. Anything you can do to put a dent in their ranks would benefit our forces immensely. Take care when you move into their camp, friend, for they are a deadly foe. I shall circle 'round and meet with you when you reach the other side.'
